description: Try our easy to follow Easy Welsh Rarebit recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Easy Welsh Rarebit Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Line a baking sheet with aluminum foil. Position the broiler rack 10cm from the heat, and preheat. Toast the bread on both sides until golden brown. Transfer the toast to the baking sheet.
Melt the butter in a saucepan over low heat. Add the cheese, ale, and mustard and cook, stirring often, until the cheese is melted and smooth.

Pour the sauce over the toast. Splash a few drops of Worcestershire sauce on each. Return the cheese-covered toast to the broiler for a few minutes, or until the cheese is bubbling and golden. Cut each slice in half and serve.
